title: Super International Cricket for SNES
material_description: Cartridge videogame. Cartridge and manual in cardboard box
brief_description: A sequel to International Cricket, this improves on the graphics and audio from the previous game. It has eight teams: Sri Lanka, Australia, England, South Africa, New Zealand, India, Pakistan and the West Indies. However, the game lacks official team and player licensing, unlike its predecessor. It also opts for the Australian scoring of the game, as opposed to the international method.
